summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Silwer Lining Photography website with real content from silwerlining.co.za. Backend API working with ZAR pricing, frontend displaying real images and testimonials correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Portfolio and testimonials return 0 items from database, using frontend defaults
minor_issues.impact: No impact - frontend gracefully falls back to real default content

ui_bugs.issue: Category filter doesn't update URL parameters

integration_issues.issue: Minor interaction issue with subject selection dropdown

passed_tests: Real testimonials with client names (Tracey, Thandiwe, Keke)
Nadia's complete story and location (Helderkruin, Roodepoort)
All 7 portfolio categories (Maternity, Newborn, Family, Baby Birthday, Adult Birthday, Brand/Product)
Booking flow with new session types (Maternity, Newborn, Studio Portraits)
